Quick search

Welcome to gufo’s documentation!¶

windows module

A module to design a gui for entering simple data.

class window.window.Window¶

A class that represents a general window of the graphical interface.

self.frameslist

A list of frames from top to bottom.

self.fieldsdict

A dict of the fields to read.

self.checksdict

A dict of the checks to read.

add_button(frame, text, command)¶

Adds a button to the window.

frametkinter.Frame

The frame to which you want to add the label.

textstring

The message to display on the button.

commandstring

The method to be executed when the button is pressed.

add_checkbutton(frame, row, column, field)¶

Adds a checkbutton to the window.

frametkinter.Frame

The frame to which you want to add the checkbutton.

rowint

The row for the checkbutton.

columnint

The column for the checkbutton.

fieldstring

The message to display next to the checkbutton field.

add_entry(frame, row, field)¶

Adds an entry to the window.

frametkinter.Frame

The frame to which you want to add the entry.

rowint

The row for the entry.

fieldstring

The message to display next to the entry field.

add_frame()¶

Makes the frame for the window.

read()¶

Reads the data in the window.

set_label(frame, text)¶

Sets a label for the window.

show()¶

Shows the window.

application module

A module that contains the windows required in a program that manages job applications.

class window.application.WindowChoice¶

A class that represents a window with a choice of the graphical interface.

load()¶

Moves to the load window and destroys the choice window.

make_window()¶

Executes all the methods required to make the window.

new()¶

Moves to the new window and destroys the choice window.

class window.application.WindowLoad¶

A class that represents a window to load another object from the graphical interface.

make_window()¶

Executes all the methods required to make the window.

class window.application.WindowNew¶

A class that represents a window to create another object from the graphical interface.

add_contact(frame)¶

Adds the contact section to the window.

frametkinter.Frame

The frame to which you want to add the checkbutton.

add_documents(frame)¶

Adds the documents section to the window.

frametkinter.Frame

The frame to which you want to add the checkbutton.

add_position(frame)¶

Adds the position section to the window.

frametkinter.Frame

The frame to which you want to add the checkbutton.

make_window()¶

Executes all the methods required to make the window.

german module

A module that contains the windows required in a program that manages german verbs.

class window.german.WindowVerb¶

A class that represents a window to create another object from the graphical interface.

add_verb(frame)¶

Adds the verb fields to the window.

frametkinter.Frame

The frame to which you want to add the checkbutton.

make_window()¶

Executes all the methods required to make the window.
